abstract.t: This document extends Locator/ID Separation Protocol (LISP) with a capability for bulk mapping retrieval. It does so by defining new LISP messages that are meant to facilitate state recovery of mapping tables and improve Ingress Tunnel Routers (ITR) recovery times, in particular. In addition, this document allows to request mappings that match destination IP prefixes, names, or AS numbers. This document updates RFC6830.
